subject: BLESSINGS FOLLOW YOU !!
body:
BLESSINGS FOLLOW YOU !!
My name is Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey from United States, a widow suffering from Breast Cancer and Stroke, which denied me a child as a result, i may not last till the next two months according to my doctor report. I'm married to late Pastor Jeffrey Wilson, and we were married for many years without any child before his death. I'm 68 years old woman. I have some funds i inherited from my late husband the sum of US$10,000,000,00 (Ten Million dollars) which i needed a very honest and God fearing person who will claim the funds from the bank and use the funds for work of God Affairs like; donation in the house of God, propagating the good news of God and to endeavor God worshiping place and help less-privileged. I found your profile and i decided to contact you for the donation work of God.
I don't need any telephone communication in this regards because of my health according to my doctor report, please if you would be able to use the funds for the work of God as i stated ,contact me back so i will lead you to Alpha  bank  where this funds was deposited by my late husband Pastor Jeffrey Wilson  , for you to retrieve the funds in my name as the next of kin.
please contact me on my private email (
belovedjeffrey002@gmail.com
)
I will stop here until i hear from you.
Always pray for my health.
May God bless you In Jesus name Amen!!!
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re:   BLESSINGS FOLLOW YOU !!
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that even in such a difficult time, you're thinking about doing God's work and helping others.

However, I have a few questions if you don't mind. Could you please tell me more about the kind of projects or charities you would like this donation to be used for? Also, could you provide more details about how the process of retrieving these funds would work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon. May God bless you and give you strength.

Best wishes,
Lowell

subject: Re: BLESSINGS FOLLOW YOU !!
body:
Thanks for your email and concern about my health May God bless you!!  I
will like you to use 60% of this funds to build orphanage homes , go to
hospitals and pay several hospitals bills for sick people , buy food items
and share among the needy , go to the prisons and give the prisoners food,
sponsor the building of churches and keep 40% of it for yourself.

On your next email, please send me your full name, resident address and
phone number so I can submit an application letter to Alpha Bank for them
to hand the funds over to you as my next of kin so you can help me carry
out my last wish on earth before I finally join my creator in Heaven.

I appreciate you for the good work of God you are doing and i pray God bless
you as you continue to do it.

I will stop here until I hear from you,

Always pray for my health.
God will bless you.
Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey.

subject: Re: BLESSINGS FOLLOW YOU !!
body:
Hello Mrs. Jessica Jeffrey,

I'm deeply touched by your email and the noble cause you're advocating for. It's truly inspiring to see such selflessness, especially in these trying times. I'm more than willing to help carry out your last wish on earth.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please provide me with more details about the orphanage homes and hospitals that you'd like me to assist? Also, could you tell me more about how the funds will be managed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lowell
